basics.name: Jonathan Berti
basics.label: Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer | Healthcare Technology | Cloud Architecture
basics.summary: Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer with 15+ years building enterprise-scale applications, currently specializing in healthcare technology platforms. Deep expertise in legacy system modernization, microservices architecture, and cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure, GCP). Proven track record architecting HIPAA-compliant healthcare solutions with React, Vue.js, Python, Node.js, and TypeScript. 25+ years Linux systems administration experience. Led cross-functional engineering teams and mentored developers on modern DevOps practices, CI/CD automation, and Agile methodologies. Expertise in EHR integration, clinical workflow optimization, and secure patient data management.

work.name: CVS Health
work.summary: Leading digital transformation of legacy healthcare applications to cloud-native microservices architecture for enterprise-scale patient care systems.
highlights: Architecting and implementing microservices migration from legacy C# monolith to Python/FastAPI services, improving system scalability by 200% and reducing deployment time by 65%
Engineering modern React single-page applications (SPAs) with TypeScript for clinical staff workflows, serving 500+ healthcare facilities
Designing and implementing CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions, Docker, and Kubernetes for automated testing and zero-downtime deployments
Leading cloud infrastructure modernization initiatives on AWS (EC2, ECS, Lambda, RDS) ensuring HIPAA compliance and data security best practices
Pioneering AI-assisted development workflows using Claude Code, Cursor AI, Model Context Protocol (MCP), AI Rules & Skills, and AI Agents to accelerate feature delivery by 40%
Collaborating with cross-functional teams (Product, QA, DevOps) using Agile/Scrum methodologies to deliver healthcare software solutions on schedule

Implemented comprehensive unit testing (Jest, Vitest) and end-to-end testing (Cypress) achieving 85% code coverage and reducing production defects by 50%
Established code review standards and mentored 5 junior developers on Vue.js best practices, TypeScript patterns, and modern frontend architecture
Pioneered AI-assisted development practices using Cursor AI and Model Context Protocol (MCP), increasing development velocity by 35%
Integrated RESTful APIs and GraphQL services for seamless communication between frontend applications and backend microservices
